code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import musicSlice from"./features/music/musicSlice";import musicSaga from"../src/redux/saga/musicSaga";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();export var store=configureStore({reducer:{music:musicSlice},middleware:[sagaMiddleware]});sagaMiddleware.run(musicSaga);
